snippet: Mike Battaglia of Churchill Downs made the Arkansas Derby winner Bodemeister the morning-line favorite for the 138th running of the Derby.
abstract: Churchill Downs oddsmaker Mike Battaglia makes the Arkansas Derby winner Bodemeister the morning-line favorite for the 138th running of the Kentucky Derby.
lead_paragraph: Mike Battaglia of Churchill Downs made the Arkansas Derby winner Bodemeister the morning-line favorite for the 138th running of the Derby.

headline.seo: Kentucky Derby Has Draw, Odds and Uncertainty
headline.print_headline: Favorite for the Derby? An Oddsmaker Shrugs
